kpi.name: M8013C21

kpi_info.title: Number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for emergency calls
kpi_info.use: Number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for emergency calls. UPDATED: Reception of the RRC: RRCConnectionRequest message (eNB <- UE) in case that this message contains the EstablishmentCause set to emergency (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for emergency calls
